headline: Warren Buffett Just Trimmed His Stake in Ulta Beauty Stock. Time to Sell?
summary: Just one quarter after Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway bought more than $266 million worth of Ulta Beauty (NASDAQ: ULTA) stock, the conglomerate dumped nearly all of that stake in the third quarter this year, selling more than 95% of its shares.  The move was surprising for those who follow Buffett.  It's not clear why Berkshire sold most of its stake in Ulta, but let's take a closer look at the beauty retailer to see if selling the stock is the right move for you.
